sentences.english: Pour is show empress dowager joke.

sentences.english: The protesters were throwing bottles at Japanese restaurants, as the police looked on laughing.
sentences.chinese: 抗議者們向日本餐館扔鞋，警方則袖手旁觀看笑話。

sentences.english: I wonder how many jokes they made last month when the elder gentleman crashed his US plane into a crowd of Americans.
sentences.chinese: 我想知道我們上次墜機的時候中國有多少人在看笑話。

sentences.english: Now during all of this,the fans of the body view typically are laughing.
sentences.chinese: 這時候，信仰肉體理論的人就看笑話了。
